bool OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IAuthorizationService.IsAuthorizedForRegion ( GridRegion  region,
AgentCircuitData  agent,
bool  isRootAgent,
out string  reason 
)

Gets whether the given agent is able to enter the given region as a root or child agent.

Parameters:
region The region the agent is attempting to enter
agent The CircuitData of the agent that is attempting to enter
isRootAgent Whether the agent is a root agent or not
reason If it fails, the reason they cannot enter
Returns:
